attributes.action: Implement a ban on sale of all non-silent fireworks in the UK
attributes.additional_details: By taking these measures, we can all preserve the joy and celebration that fireworks bring, while protecting the wellbeing of vulnerable individuals, animals, and our environment. We hope the Government will consider our petition seriously and take the necessary steps to safeguard our communities. Thank you for your attention to this urgent matter.
attributes.background: We would like to express our growing concern regarding the use of loud fireworks within our communities. We urge the government to enact regulations that: ban the sale and use of excessively loud fireworks; implement stricter controls and penalties for non-compliance.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
